alert.note: Alert for McCormick (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 7:19PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Lincoln and McCormick Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 718 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bobby Brown State Park, or 15 miles northeast of Washington, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... McCormick, Lincolnton, Elijah Clark State Park, Mccormick County Airport, Lake Strom Thurmond, Bradley, Plum Branch, Bordeaux, Double Branches, Curry Hill, Chennault, New Hope, Long Cane Creek Picnic Area, Hickory Knob State Resort Park, Loce, Gill`s Point, Hester`s Ferry Campground, Mount Carmel, Baker Creek State Park and Leroy`s Ferry Recreation Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
